column2: ggpairs(daily_combined_data,columns = c(3,4,5,15,20,21),title="Figure-3: Daily correlations 1",ggplot2::aes(colour = activity_level,alpha=0.5),lower = list(combo = "count"),upper = list(continuous = wrap("cor", size=3)))+theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(size = 6, angle = 90),axis.text.y  = element_text(size = 6), text = element_text(size=9))
